title: Palette in the Form of a Bird, Perhaps a Guinea Fowl
description:
Dark green slate palette in the form of a bird. Pierced at top for suspension. Eye on each side inlaid with ivory (?) and held in place by a black substance. 

Condition: Leg broken away; several chips at tail area.
medium: Graywacke, shell or bone, black paste
